Client.Name: Shenyang Dongya Medical Research Institute Co.

Project.Brief history of your project and organi: We are a company dedicated to providing quality healthcare services. As a leading healthcare provider, we aim to provide our patients with the best possible treatment options through advanced technology and a dedicated team of healthcare professionals. Improving people's quality of life and helping them regain their health and stay well through innovative healthcare solutions. We are committed to being a leader in healthcare, delivering excellence in healthcare and making a positive social impact. We provide comprehensive healthcare services covering a wide range of areas including prevention, diagnosis, treatment and rehabilitation. We have a team of experienced doctors, nurses and healthcare professionals with a wide range of expertise and clinical experience to provide personalised and integrated medical care to our patients.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: Medical data, surgical data, equipment and other videos and images, medical literature, etc.
